itunes:title: Drinkin' Bros Fake News 32 - The Impeachment Meltdown
title: Drinkin' Bros Fake News 32 - The Impeachment Meltdown
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Tiffany Hart bring you the realest fake news of the week with Kamal Harris dropping out of the Democratic Presidential race, the impeachment meltdown that has turned out to be an absolute bust, Kid Rock going after Oprah...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Tiffany Hart bring you the realest fake news of the week with Kamal Harris dropping out of the Democratic Presidential race, the impeachment meltdown that has turned out to be an absolute bust, Kid Rock going after Oprah, the hospitals that are suing President Trump to keep their negotiated drug and procedures prices hidden, the North Carolina woman on oxygen who accidentally killed while smoking a cigarette, and the Spotify decade recap that has users freaked out.
